io.smudgr.engine.param

Class ParameterObserverNotifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.smudgr.engine.param.ParameterObserverNotifier

  • public class ParameterObserverNotifier
extends java.lang.Object
    The ParameterObserverNotifier class tracks and notifies ParameterObserver observers of Parameter changes.
    See Also:
    Project.getParameterObserverNotifier()

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ParameterObserverNotifier() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attach(ParameterObserver observer)
      Add a ParameterObserver to notify of Parameter changes.
      void notify(Parameter param, ParameterObserver ignoreObserver)
      Notifies all attached ParameterObserver instances of Parameter changes.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParameterObserverNotifier

        public ParameterObserverNotifier()

    • Method Detail

      • attach

        public void attach(ParameterObserver observer)
        Add a ParameterObserver to notify of Parameter changes.
        Parameters:
        observer - ParameterObserver
        See Also:
        Project.getParameterObserverNotifier()

      • notify

        public void notify(Parameter param,
                   ParameterObserver ignoreObserver)
        Notifies all attached ParameterObserver instances of Parameter changes.

        Optionally ignore a specific ParameterObserver in case the observer is the source that changed the Parameter. This avoids infinite loops.

        Parameters:
        param - Parameter
        ignoreObserver - ParameterObserver
        See Also:
        Project.getParameterObserverNotifier()
